mapper.sql: id, user_id, name, description, cover_url, status, post_count, subscribe_count, is_recommended, sort, last_post_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `column` (user_id, name, description, cover_url, status, post_count, subscribe_count, is_recommended, sort, last_post_time, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{coverUrl}, #{status}, #{postCount}, #{subscribeCount}, #{isRecommended}, #{sort}, #{lastPostTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM `column` WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT FROM `column` WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = #{status} ORDER BY sort ASC, create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE `column` SET post_count = post_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE `column` SET post_count = GREATEST(0, post_count - 1), update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE `column` SET subscribe_count = subscribe_count + 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE `column` SET subscribe_count = GREATEST(0, subscribe_count - 1), update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE `column` SET last_post_time = #{time}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM `column` WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY last_post_time DESC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT FROM `column` WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY subscribe_count DESC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT FROM `column` WHERE status = 1 AND (name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY subscribe_count DESC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `column` WHERE status = 1 AND (name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
SELECT FROM `column` WHERE status = 1 AND is_recommended = 1 ORDER BY subscribe_count DESC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT c. FROM `column` c INNER JOIN column_post cp ON c.id = cp.column_id WHERE cp.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY cp.sort ASC, cp.create_time ASC
